verses.text:
THERE is a holy city,
A happy place above,
Among the starry regions,
Built by the God of love.

There Jesus sits exalted,
In God-like majesty;
The angels bow before him,
The elders bend the knee.
While we'll march around Jerusalem, &c.

Is this the man of sorrows
Who stood at Pilate's barâ€”
Condemned by haughty Herod,
And by his men of war?
Yes we'll march around Jerusalem, &c.

He seems a mighty conqueror,
Who spoiled the powers below,
And ransomed many captives
From sin, from want and woe.
We'll shout around Jerusalem, &c.

chorus.text:
Yes, we'll march around Jerusalem,
We'll march around Jerusalem,
We'll march around Jerusalem,
When we arrive at home.
